features.subject: Document Management
features.description: Users can now search, view, add, edit, delete, and download a documents.

features.subject: User Management
features.description: Admin users can now search, view, add, edit, and delete a user.

features.subject: Forgot/Reset Password
features.description: Users may able to reset his/her password.

features.subject: User Defined Field (UDF) Management
features.description: Admin users can now search, view, add, edit, and delete user defined field metadata.
